emma2.msm.estimation.count_matrix¶

emma2.msm.estimation.count_matrix(dtraj, lag, sliding=True)¶

Generate a count matrix from given list(s) of integers.

Parameters:

dtraj : array_like or list of array_like

Discretized trajectory or list of discretized trajectories

lag : int

Lagtime in trajectory steps

sliding : bool, optional

If true the sliding window approach is used for transition counting.
Returns:

C : scipy.sparse.coo_matrix

The count matrix at given lag in coordinate list format.
